attributes.additional_details:
Stop 'Sleaze' In Government

Stop political parties getting their funds from 'donors', whether trade unions - as in the case of

the Labour Party - and big city financiers in the case of the Conservative Party.

We should outlaw all donations to registered political parties in this country.

They should be funded by the state dependent on level of membership.

Secret meetings between government ministers and potential party donors - aka 'Breakfast meetings'
- should be outlawed.

Vote for a law to be passed now.
